mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SCHEDULE( UNQ ,SCHDT ,TITLE ,CONT ,USERID ,REGDT ) VALUES ( sch_seq.nextval ,'${schdt}' ,'${title}' ,'${cont}' ,'${userid}' ,sysdate )
mapper.select: SELECT DD,COUNT(DD) CNT FROM( SELECT TO_CHAR(SCHDT,'DD') DD FROM SCHEDULE WHERE USERID=#{userid} AND TO_CHAR(SCHDT,'YYYY-MM') = #{schdt}) A GROUP BY DD
